column4: What is the minimum amount of time I should wait before re-asking a question?
are you using alsa?
I'm not sure--I don't know what that is.
sudo apt-get install alsa-base alsa-utils
What is that?
it installs alsa, the linux sound server
just type it into a terminal
alsa-base is already the newest version.
Same for the other.
type alsamixer into a terminal since it's installed
Got it.
if it says MM it's muted, 00 if it's not
Says 00
My audio works--I'm listening to something in VLC right now... It's just that it doesn't work from firefox. Even if there is no other application open playing audio.
ok I'm trying to find where you can change the sound in firefox, if your using flash it sometimes screws up, but not everytime
Thank you.
have you tried restarting firefox?
Yes.
Ah you know what, I think I'm able to just download the file from the site, so I guess I'm alright.
No worries, thanks for trying, I really do appreciate it.
Have a good night. Cheers
did you try killall -9 esd yet?
